tool_description: Antherica A.I. Writer Is a set of powerful APIs to provide a comprehensive suite of tools for content creation, translation, text revision, newsletter writing, keyword and hashtag searching, and QR code generation. With the assistance of AI algorithms, users can streamline their content-related tasks and achieve professional-level results efficiently.
title: AI-writer

api_list.name: Revise
Hashtags
api_list.description: Generate hashtags from a given text.

api_list.name: Keywords
api_list.description: Quickly define keywords from a given text

api_list.name: Newsletter
api_list.description: Write a compelling newsletter from a given text

required_parameters.name: text
required_parameters.default: See you at Sigep in Bologna

api_list.name: Text
QR Code
api_list.description: Generate a QR Code from a link or a text.

api_list.name: Translation
api_list.description: Translate content into any language just enter the language name.
